biotools.summary: Collection of experimentally verified intrinsically disordered proteins (IDPs) or intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs). Manually curated annotations on IDPs in locations, structures, and functional sites such as protein binding regions and posttranslational modification sites.

bioschemas.name: IDEAL
bioschemas.summary: Collection of experimentally verified intrinsically disordered proteins (IDPs) or intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs). Manually curated annotations on IDPs in locations, structures, and functional sites such as protein binding regions and posttranslational modification sites.
